mapper.insert: insert into owner_info (oid, name, gender, phone, email, idnumber, birthday, isadmin, description, status) values (#{oid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=BIT}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isadmin,jdbcType=BIT}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update owner_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=BIT}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idnumber = #{idnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isadmin = #{isadmin,jdbcType=BIT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select oid, name, gender, phone, email, idnumber, birthday, isadmin, description, status from owner_info where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select oid, name, gender, phone, email, idnumber, birthday, isadmin, description, status from owner_info
